summary: A rag tag unit of misfits known as the War Pigs must go behind enemy lines to exterminate Nazis by any means necessary.
cast: Luke Goss|Dolph Lundgren|Chuck Liddell|Mickey Rourke|Noah Segan|Steven Luke|Ryan Kelley|Jake Stormoen|K.C. Clyde|Apostolos Gliarmis|Maclain Nelson|Blake Webb|Brock Richardes|Nate Harward|Loic Anthian|James Wyatt Scott|Kellie Hamilton|Angie Papanikolas|Randy Beard|Casey Sill|Raury Cruse|Graham Schuetzle|Scott Steben|Adam Simon|Valiant Michael|David Mark Bresnahan|Mark S. Fordham|Kurt Septon|Rob York
title: Comando War Pigs
